column6:
The battle for the fate of the Marvel Universe has begun! The Fantastic Four are joined by Hulk, Thor, Captain America, and the Avengers-all going head-to-head against the most dangerous creature ever created: Onslaught! All-out action as only Jeph Loeb and Rob Liefeld can deliver!,2007,1
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Rob Liefeld | writer:Jeph Loeb | letterer:Richard Starkings
